<Text: The Happiest Place in Town (song)
2:
--------------------
Text: The Happiest Place in Town (song):  While the B-side "Take Me Anywhere" was written by Bray, bass guitarist Helen Carter and Philip; it is their first single not co-written with lead vocalist Deborah Conway.
